title: 第 13 集 秘密！| Secrets!

data.zh: 猪妈妈给佩奇做了一个特别的盒子。
data.en: Mummy Pig has made a special box for Peppa.

data.zh: 佩奇，这个盒子是给你的！
data.en: Peppa, this box is just for you!

data.zh: 谢谢妈妈！
data.en: Thank you, Mummy!

data.zh: 这是给你放秘密东西的秘密盒子。
data.en: It's a secret box for you to keep secret things in.

data.zh: 我可以放什么进去啊，妈妈？
data.en: What things can I put in it, Mummy?

data.zh: 只有你自己能决定了，佩奇！
data.en: Only you can decide that, Peppa!

data.zh: 它是你的秘密盒子！
data.en: It's your secret box!

data.zh: 我知道我可以放什么进去了！
data.en: I know what I can put in it!

data.zh: 好的。但不用告诉我的。
data.en: Good. But don't tell me.

data.zh: 我不会告诉你，乔治还有爸爸的！
data.en: I won't tell you or George or Daddy!

data.zh: 它是个秘密！
data.en: It's a secret!!

data.zh: 乔治，这是我的秘密盒子！
data.en: George, this is my secret box!

data.zh: 它是空的。我得找些东西放里面。
data.en: It's empty. I have to find some things to put inside.

data.zh: 乔治想帮佩奇。
data.en: George wants to help Peppa.

data.zh: 不，乔治，只有我可以知道里面放了什么。
data.en: No, George, only I must know what's in the box.

data.zh: 我选东西时你得在外面等。
data.en: You have to wait outside while I choose.

data.zh: 佩奇选东西放进秘密盒子里。
data.en: Peppa is going to choose some secret things to put in the box.

data.zh: 现在，我的秘密盒子装满了！
data.en: Now, my secret box is full!

data.zh: 乔治，你不准偷看里面的东西哦！
data.en: George, you must not look inside!

data.zh: 乔治想知道佩奇的秘密盒子里有什么。
data.en: George would like to know what is inside Peppa's secret box.

data.zh: 如果你想知道，你可以猜猜看。
data.en: If you like, you can try to guess.

data.zh: 恐龙！
data.en: Dine-Saw!

data.zh: 乔治认为佩奇把恐龙放进盒子里！
data.en: George thinks Peppa has put a dinosaur in the box!

data.zh: 哦，乔治！
data.en: Oh, George!

data.zh: 你总是把所有东西都说成“恐龙”！
data.en: You always say dinosaur for everything!

data.zh: 至少，恐龙太大了放不进盒子里的啊。
data.en: Anyway, a dinosaur is too big to fit in the box.

data.zh: 乔治猜不到佩奇秘密盒子里装的是什么东西。
data.en: George cannot guess what is in Peppa's secret box.

data.zh: 猪爸爸正在清理照片。
data.en: Daddy Pig is cleaning a picture.

data.zh: 爸爸！这是我的秘密盒子！
data.en: Daddy! This is my secret box!

data.zh: 妈妈给我做的！
data.en: Mummy made it for me!

data.zh: 好漂亮的盒子，佩奇！里面装了什么？
data.en: It's very nice, Peppa! what's inside?

data.zh: 这可是个秘密哦！
data.en: It's a secret!

data.zh: 乔治想猜，但他没猜对。
data.en: George tried to guess, but he didn't get it right.

data.zh: 我可以试试吗？
data.en: Can I have a try?

data.zh: 可以。
data.en: Yes.

data.zh: 嗯。你把我的眼镜放里面了？
data.en: Hmmm. Have you put my glasses inside?

data.zh: 不对！！！你的眼镜在你头上。
data.en: No!!! Your glasses are on your head!

data.zh: 确实是！
data.en: So they are!

data.zh: 糊涂的爸爸！你得再猜猜。
data.en: Silly Daddy! You must have a proper guess.

data.zh: 好的。你把妈妈的鞋子放盒子里了？
data.en: Ok. Have you put Mummy's shoes in the box?

data.zh: 不对！你所有可以猜的机会，都用完了！
data.en: Nope! And that's all your guesses. Used up!

data.zh: 佩奇喜欢秘密！
data.en: Peppa likes secrets!

data.zh: 妈妈！没人知道我盒子里装了什么！
data.en: Mummy! No one knows what is in my box!

data.zh: 妈妈！没人知道我盒子里装了什么！
data.en: Oh. what has George got?

data.zh: 我也给乔治做了一个盒子！
data.en: I made a box for George, too!

data.zh: 他已经装满了秘密的东西！
data.en: And he's filled it with secret things!

data.zh: 只有乔治知道里面装了什么东西。
data.en: And only George knows what's inside.

data.zh: 哦。
data.en: Oh.

data.zh: 佩奇想知道乔治的盒子里有什么东西。
data.en: Peppa would like to know what is inside George's box.

data.zh: 当然是乔治的恐龙玩具啦！
data.en: It's George's toy dinosaur, of course!

data.zh: 不对！
data.en: No!

data.zh: 乔治的恐龙玩具不在乔治的盒子里。
data.en: George's toy dinosaur is not in George's box.

data.zh: 这也太难了。我永远也猜不到！
data.en: It's too difficult! I'll never guess!

data.zh: 佩奇不像之前那么喜欢秘密了。
data.en: Peppa does not like secrets as much as she used to.

data.zh: 也许，如果你给乔治看一样你盒子里的东西，
data.en: Maybe, if you showed George one thing from your box,

data.zh: 那么乔治也可以给你看一样他的东西。
data.en: then he could show you one thing from his.

data.zh: 行。但我们得同时进行。
data.en: Ok. But we must do it at the same time.

data.zh: 这是一个好主意。数到三，
data.en: That's a good idea. On the count of three,

data.zh: 你们同时打开盒子。
data.en: you each show what's in your boxes.

data.zh: 准备好了没？
data.en: Ready?

data.zh: 好了。
data.en: Yes.
One... two... THREE!

data.zh: 乔治藏了个鼓，佩奇藏了个喇叭。
data.en: George has a drum and Peppa has a trumpet.

data.zh: 太棒了！
data.en: Lovely!

data.zh: 是的，听上去很不错。
data.en: Yes, it sounds very nice.

data.zh: 你们还有什么秘密东西吗？
data.en: Do you have anymore secret things?

data.zh: 乔治藏了一个蛋奶甜甜圈！
data.en: George has a custard doughnut!

data.zh: 哦。
data.en: Oh.

data.zh: 但是佩奇的盒子是空的。
data.en: But Peppa's box is empty.

data.zh: 我什么东西都没有了！
data.en: I've got nothing else!

data.zh: 幸好，我还有！来吧。快吃吧。
data.en: Luckily, I have! Come on. Tuck in.

data.zh: 乔治，佩奇，猪妈妈和猪爸爸
data.en: George, Peppa, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig

data.zh: 都喜欢蛋奶甜甜圈！
data.en: all like custard doughnuts!

data.zh: 我没有特别的盒子！
data.en: I don't have a special box.

data.zh: 但我有个好地方可以藏我的蛋奶甜甜圈！
data.en: But I know a very good place to hide my custard doughnut!

data.zh: 你们猜是哪里？
data.en: Can you guess where?

data.zh: 嗯。你打算把它藏在冰箱里吗？
data.en: Um. Are you going to hide it in the fridge?

data.zh: 不！一个更特别的地方！
data.en: No! Somewhere much more special!

data.zh: 我的肚子！
data.en: My tummy!

data.zh: 太好吃了！
data.en: Mmmmmm! Delicious!

data.zh: 我也要把我的藏在我的肚子里！
data.en: I'm going to hide mine in my tummy!

data.zh: 我也是！
data.en: Me, too!
